securitygame

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPickup.Graph

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Network class is use for generating a network. Game master will use this class to generate a network.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Network() 
      Network(int networkName)
      Constructor used by Game master to initialize network.

      Constructor used by Game master to initialize network.
